body:
could you pull out len(inputSlice1[0]) and len(inputSlice1[0][0])
into explicitly named variables to help clarify the intent of those comparisons, outside of the loop body?
SomeName := len(inputSlice1[0][0])  ...
It also makes it more clear that the value isn't actually changing throughout the execution of the loop.
